sentence.Network_en: He had to cancel some engagements because of tiredness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他太累了，不得不取消一些约会。

sentence.Network_en: Ignoring feelings of tiredness knocks our body clocks out of kilter.
sentence.Network_cn: 忽视疲劳感会打乱我们的生物钟。

sentence.Network_en: Peppermint leaves are believed to relieve tiredness and nasal stuffiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 据信薄荷叶可以减轻疲劳和鼻塞。

list.abs: are some vision tiredness symptoms ., 只是视觉疲劳的一些症状.
if your eyes are aching , doing some eye exercise can relieve your eye tiredness .如果你的眼睛感到疼痛，做眼操可以缓解你的视力疲劳。
Is it caused by physical tiredness , mental exhaustion or fidgety resulting from stress ?, 是身体劳累 , 心理疲惫还是因紧张而烦躁?
He seems never to see what tiredness is , and an eager beaver ., 他似乎从来不知道什么叫累 , 真是勤奋的人.

entry.def: If you are tired, you feel that you want to rest or sleep.

example.ex: Michael is tired and he has to rest after his long trip.
example.tran: 迈克尔累了，他在长途旅行以后必须休息。

entry.tran: (身体部位)显出倦意的，感到疲乏的
entry.def: You can describe a part of your body as tired if it looks or feels as if you need to rest it or to sleep.

example.ex: Cucumber is good for soothing tired eyes…
example.tran: 黄瓜有助于舒缓眼部疲劳。

example.ex: My arms are tired, and my back is tense.
example.tran: 我的胳膊很累，背部肌肉紧绷得难受。

entry.def: If you are tired of something, you do not want it to continue because you are bored of it or unhappy with it.

example.ex: I am tired of all the speculation...
I was tired of being a bookkeeper.

entry.def: If you describe something as tired, you are critical of it because you have heard it or seen it many times.

example.ex: I didn't want to hear another one of his tired excuses...
example.tran: 我不想听他的又一个老掉牙的借口。

example.ex: What we see at Westminster is a tired old ritual.
example.tran: 我们在威斯敏斯特教堂看到的是一种经年不变的古旧仪式。

means.word_mean: 1. temporary loss of strength and energy resulting from hard physical or mental work;

sentences.sentence: "growing fatigue was apparent from the decline in the execution of their athletic skills"
"weariness overcame her after twelve hours and she fell asleep"

auth_sentence.content: This may be accompanied by tiredness and joint pains.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,"性质,状态",通常加在形容词后面

stems_affixes.word_buile: bright明亮的+ness性质,状态→n.明亮,辉煌,聪明
busi+ness性质,状态→n.商业,买卖,交易,生意
careful小心的,仔细的+ness性质,状态→n.仔细,慎重
clean清洁+li+ness性质,状态→cleanliness洁癖,清洁

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意识,知觉,自觉,觉悟,个人思想
stems_affixes.word_buile: conscious意识到的+ness性质,状态→n.意识,知觉,自觉,觉悟,个人思想
dark黑暗+ness性质,状态→n.黑暗,阴暗,秘密
empty空的+ness性质,状态→emptiness空虚,无知
firm坚定+ness性质,状态→n.坚定,稳固
forward向前的,鲁莽的+ness性质,状态→n.大胆,鲁莽
fulsome过度的,虚假的+ness性质,状态→n.虚情,谄媚

stems_affixes.value_cn: 仁慈,亲切;好意;友好行为
stems_affixes.word_buile: kind仁慈的,和蔼的+ness性质,状态→n.仁慈,亲切;好意;友好行为
like像+ness性质,状态→n.相象,相似物
polite有礼貌的+ness性质,状态→n.有礼,优雅
positive肯定的+ness性质,状态→n.肯定,信心
pretentious自命不凡的+ness性质,状态→n.自命不凡
prompt敏捷的,迅速的,即时的+ness性质,状态→n.敏捷,迅速
tight紧的+ness性质,状态→n.坚固,紧密
tired疲乏的+ness性质,状态→n.疲劳,疲倦
useful有用的+ness性质,状态→n.有用,有效性
useless无用的+ness性质,状态→n.无用
weak弱的,虚弱的+ness性质,状态→n.虚弱,软弱,弱点,缺点
thick厚的+ness性质,状态→n.厚度,浓度,稠密

sentences.en: Tiredness and despair were etched into his face.
sentences.cn: 疲乏与失望刻在他的脸上。

sentences.en: Tiredness can seriously impair your ability to drive.
sentences.cn: 疲劳会大大影响你的驾驶能力。

sentences.en: Tiredness is one of the most common symptoms of stress.
sentences.cn: 疲倦是由压力引起的最常见症状之一。
